title: THARP DID IT
content:
THARP DID IT: GRAPHIC WORK  
A Retrospective Exhibit & Gala Reception  
EXHIBIT: March 2-30, 2007  
Art Museum of Los Gatos - 4 Tait Avenue, Los Gatos, CA  
Museum is open Wed-Sun - 12-4 PM  
RECEPTION GALA: Saturday, March 24 - 6-9 PM  
Silent Auction o benefit the Rick Tharp Design Scholarship  
Exhibit and Reception Fee
